# Summon Desert Ally VIII (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Summoning Spells|summoning]])

**Level:** [[8th Level Druid Spells|Druid 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 16th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 16]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Sandstorm (WotC), pg. 122

This spell functions like *[[Summon Desert Ally I (Spell)|summon desert ally I]]*, except that you can summon one 8th-level creature, 1d3 7th-level creatures of the same kind, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures of the same kind.
